Uses of Class
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player.Effect.EffectDecorator

Packages that use EffectDecorator 
Package Description
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player.Effect  

  • Uses of EffectDecorator in it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player.Effect

    Subclasses of EffectDecorator in it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player.Effect 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  BlockOpponentEffect
    this decorator blocks the possibility of opponent player to move up during their turn
    class  BuildBeforeEffect
    this decorator gives the possibility to build before every move action, if the player uses this god's effect, he cannot move up in the same turn
    class  BuildInsideCellEffect
    this decorator gives the possibility to build twice, but player can not build for the second time on the perimeter cells
    class  BuildNotOnSameCellEffect  
    class  BuildOnSameCellEffect  
    class  BuildUnderItselfEffect  
    class  CanBuildUnderItselfEffect  
    class  CanDestroyEffect  
    class  CanForceEffect  
    class  CanPushOpponentEffect  
    class  CanSwitchOpponentEffect  
    class  DestroyEffect  
    class  DomeBuildEffect
    this decorator gives the possibility to build a dome even if the level isn't number 3
    class  DownTwoEffect  
    class  MoreBuildInsideEffect  
    class  MoreBuildNotOnSameEffect  
    class  MoreBuildOnSameEffect  
    class  MoreMoveEffect  
    class  MovePerimeterAgainEffect
    this decorator gives the possibility to move again each time the pawn moves onto perimeter space
    class  NotMoveBackEffect  
    class  NotMoveUpEffect  
    class  PushEffect  
    class  SwitchEffect
